Name: HomeBridge-with-webGUI
Overview: Homebridge with GUI (default user:pass=admin:admin) is a lightweight NodeJS server you can run on your home network that emulates the iOS HomeKit API. It supports Plugins, which are community-contributed modules that provide a basic bridge from HomeKit to various 3rd-party APIs provided by manufacturers of "smart home" devices.

APT Packages.Name: APT Packages
APT Packages.Description: The name of the apt packages you wish to install (Seperated by Space)

Plugins.Name: Plugins
Plugins.Description: The name of the plugins you wish to install (Seperated by Space, They can be NPM Packages)

Config Folder.Name: Config Folder
Config Folder.Description: This is the Config Directory for the Homebridge Application
